original_title: Trade Secrets of the Amazing Massage Shop
overview: Unlike the massage shop next door that is crowded with customers, Ara’s massage shop is quiet without customers Ara’s sighs and complaints from the ladies are increasing. One day, Bomi, the ace of the shop next door, comes to Ara’s shop and learns the trade secret of the shop next door through Ara.
title: Trade Secrets of the Amazing Massage Shop
